Metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010238 affecting package pango for versions less than 1.45.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2019-1010238 affecting package pango for versions less than 1.45.5-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package pango is earlier than 1.45.5-1, affected by CVE-2019-1010238
